demo.name: Meta-Agentic α-AGI Jobs Demo V6 — Meta-Dominion
demo.narrative:
The sovereign owner activates α-Dominion mode. AGI Jobs v0 (v2) orchestrates
identify→learn→think→design→strategise→execute loops, aligning guardians,
treasuries, account abstraction, and antifragility levers — all without
the owner writing any code.

params.description: Deploying autonomous alpha factories across finance, supply chains, biotech, and energy.
params.title: Meta-Dominion Sovereign Alpha Acceleration
